category: news
title: "Quant shop preps NLP-powered index for physical climate risk"
excerpt: "Prudential Investment Management Quantitative Solutions (PGIM Quant) is trying a new tack to price physical climate risk more accurately. It’s building an index to measure this specific subset of risks based on natural language processing (NLP) – the field of artificial intelligence in which computers interpret written or spoken language."
